client.name: Dr. Elena Vasquez
client.charges: First-degree murder of Judge Harrison Blackwell
why_appears_guilty: Found in judge's chambers with the victim
Had heated argument with judge day before murder
Her digital forensics software was used to access court system illegally
Fingerprints on coffee cup that contained poison
Had access to digitalis through research connections
why_actually_innocent: Was trying to expose the real killer's corruption
Her software was stolen and used to frame her
Was meeting judge to present evidence of judicial bribery

why_not_suspected: Has administrative access that appears legitimate
Known for his loyalty and dedication
Was supposedly helping investigate the security breach

victory_conditions.expose_digital_corruption: Prove Marcus used his administrative access to embezzle funds
victory_conditions.prove_framing: Show how Marcus stole Elena's software to frame her
victory_conditions.timeline_contradiction: Demonstrate Marcus lied about his whereabouts during murder
victory_conditions.motive_revelation: Reveal judge discovered embezzlement and was going to expose Marcus
